kickstart.description:
Save the partition info for a server node by sending a message to the local host. This will store the partition info in the database.
This file is a copy of 'partitions-save' which is connected to the 'client' graph. We need two files because of ordering: we want to save the partitions as early as possible on client nodes so we order 'partitions-save' off 'HEAD', but for server nodes, we need to wait for the database to be configured, so we order 'partitions-save-server' off 'TAIL'.
